00033 cpu::cpu(string plugin_id,
00034          map<string,string> properties)
00035 {
00036     // Customize if needed
00037     if(!initialize_plugin(properties))
00038         throw runtime_error("cpu plugin could not be initialized");
00039     
00040 }

00047 cpu::~cpu(void)
00048 {
00049     // Customize if needed
00050     sigar_close(sig_);
00051 
00052 }
00053 
00060 bool cpu::initialize_plugin(map<string,string> properties) 
00061 {
00062     // Customize if needed
00063     sigar_open(&sig_);
00064 
00065     sigar_net_info_t net_info;
00066     sigar_net_info_get(sig_, &net_info);
00067     
00068     strcpy(hostname_,net_info.host_name);
00069     
00070     return true;
00071 }
00072 
00084 bool cpu::generate_and_publish_information(DDSDynamicDataWriter *writer,
00085                                            DDS_DynamicData *data)
00086 {
00087     
00088     data->set_string("hostname",
00089                      DDS_DYNAMIC_DATA_MEMBER_ID_UNSPECIFIED,
00090                      hostname_);
00091     
00092     //CPU use
00093     sigar_cpu_get(sig_,&cpu_info_);
00094     
00095     data->set_double("cpu_user",
00096                      DDS_DYNAMIC_DATA_MEMBER_ID_UNSPECIFIED,
00097                      cpu_info_.user*100.0/cpu_info_.total);
00098 
00099     data->set_double("cpu_sys",
00100                      DDS_DYNAMIC_DATA_MEMBER_ID_UNSPECIFIED,
00101                      cpu_info_.sys*100.0/cpu_info_.total);
00102     
00103     data->set_double("cpu_nice",
00104                      DDS_DYNAMIC_DATA_MEMBER_ID_UNSPECIFIED,
00105                      cpu_info_.nice*100.0/cpu_info_.total);
00106     
00107     data->set_double("cpu_idle",
00108                      DDS_DYNAMIC_DATA_MEMBER_ID_UNSPECIFIED,
00109                      cpu_info_.idle*100.0/cpu_info_.total);
00110 
00111     data->set_double("cpu_wait",
00112                      DDS_DYNAMIC_DATA_MEMBER_ID_UNSPECIFIED,
00113                      cpu_info_.wait*100.0/cpu_info_.total);
00114     
00115     data->set_double("cpu_irq",
00116                      DDS_DYNAMIC_DATA_MEMBER_ID_UNSPECIFIED,
00117                      cpu_info_.irq*100.0/cpu_info_.total);
00118     
00119     data->set_double("cpu_soft_irq",
00120                      DDS_DYNAMIC_DATA_MEMBER_ID_UNSPECIFIED,
00121                      cpu_info_.soft_irq*100.0/cpu_info_.total);
00122     
00123     data->set_double("cpu_stolen",
00124                      DDS_DYNAMIC_DATA_MEMBER_ID_UNSPECIFIED,
00125                      cpu_info_.stolen*100.0/cpu_info_.total);
00126     
00127 
00128     //Load average
00129     sigar_loadavg_get(sig_,&loadavg_);
00130     
00131     data->set_double("load_one",
00132                      DDS_DYNAMIC_DATA_MEMBER_ID_UNSPECIFIED,
00133                      loadavg_.loadavg[0]);
00134     
00135     data->set_double("load_five",
00136                      DDS_DYNAMIC_DATA_MEMBER_ID_UNSPECIFIED,
00137                      loadavg_.loadavg[1]);
00138 
00139     data->set_double("load_fifteen",
00140                      DDS_DYNAMIC_DATA_MEMBER_ID_UNSPECIFIED,
00141                      loadavg_.loadavg[2]);
00142 
00143 
00144     
00145     //Timestamp (time_t)
00146     timestamp_ = time(NULL);
00147     data->set_long("ts",
00148                    DDS_DYNAMIC_DATA_MEMBER_ID_UNSPECIFIED,
00149                    timestamp_);
00150     
00151     // Then let the base class do the job of publising-----------------------------
00152     if(!publish_information(writer, data))
00153         return false;
00154 
00155     return true;
00156 
00157 }
